snippet: There are many tears when you drop your child off at college. But parents do not cry when their children go back to school in January after a month at home. We are relieved.
abstract: There are many tears when you drop your child off at college. But parents do not cry when their children go back to school in January after a month at home. We are relieved.
lead_paragraph: "What's the definition of mixed emotions?" goes the joke I heard as a young man. "Your mother-in-law driving off a cliff in your new Cadillac." LOL.

headline.main: Clashing With College Children Over Holiday Break
